Job Description: Job Description            We are currently recruiting for the role of Salesforce Software Development Engineer. The candidate would join the Product Development team and help build Salesforce Applications. The candidate will be responsible for delivering high quality user experience and business functionality.          Requirements          B.Tech (Computer Science/IT) or equivalent from a reputed institute                Exposure to Salesforce ecosystem                Expertise in Java, Javascript, HTML                Preferably worked on Salesforces developer console and Apex programming language                Experience in Development of Salesforce Lightning Components.               Candidates with experience with Einstein Analytics will be prioritized.               Skills That Will Help You In The Role               Passion for coding                Good communication skills               Ability to deliver results within committed timelines                Problem solving Ability                Can-do attitude
